      • landHereOrGoHome

        public ISquare landHereOrGoHome()
        Description copied from interface: ISquare
        invokes isOccupied(), if isOccupied() true then returns the player object to the first square. If the container is empty count == 0 , false then it returns the current square.
        Specified by:
